cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 90 miles south of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving WNW, forecast to turn NW then N across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward the northern Gulf Coast and then track inland across the Southeast U.S.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northern Gulf Coast (near the Florida Panhandle/Alabama coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: No tropical cyclone watches extend north of the Florida peninsula.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning in effect for the Florida Keys west of the Seven Mile Bridge to the Dry Tortugas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys, eastern Gulf of Mexico, and northern Gulf Coast from the Florida Panhandle westward to coastal Alabama/Mississippi
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed (Boston not included in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Boston, MA
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture could bring scattered showers or brief heavy downpours late next week, but widespread heavy rain is not anticipated.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor localized urban flooding possible if any heavier rain bands reach eastern Massachusetts.
